level.text: (a) The fee for a towing business license shall be $ 775.00 per annum, payable biennially.
The fee for a towing service storage lot license shall be $ 150.00 per annum, payable biennially.
The fee for a towing vehicle license shall be $ 163.00 per annum, payable biennially.
The fee for replacing a lost or damaged towing related license shall be $ 25.00.
